name: Cookie Crumble! - Student Game Prototype
description:
The kitchen: a place of chaos, home to ingredients of all sorts… and the home of the most delicious fighting competition in the world! As the stakes rise, so does the challenge, but Choco is one cookie who can definitely take the heat… can you?

Cookie Crumble! Is a top-down 3D brawler built using Unreal Engine 4, featuring a silly premise paired with cartoonish designs. It is a single-player top-down action game where the Player controls Choco the Cookie in a hectic food-based fighting tournament and must contend with other delicious foes to earn the ultimate prize: getting their greatest wish granted.

Let the brawl begin!
